summary: This is Cat3dokoro’s「3」, of the novel game genre. Also includes minigames outside of the main story.

Othello, Vani and Edme have finally reached the long forgotten treasure room of the Emperor Kemal. Loaded with relics, it seems they have finally obtained the goal they've been chasing....or have they? This was made for the May 2011 MAGS competition.
:3 s̶a̶v̶e̶s̶ ̶t̶e̶h̶ ̶w̶o̶r̶l̶d goes from a red place to a blue place in search of a more colorful life, while chasing balls of yarn across switches and potentially dying a lot and solving puzzles.
